title: Refining the Mountains and Rivers - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance   Xuanhuan
tags: Alchemy   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Cowardly Protagonist   Cultivation   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Soul Power   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Canteen Buns   食堂包子
description:
While the blue light blossoms, the insignificant struggle at the bottom. He grasps the opportunity to change his fate and embarks on an unprecedented path…

I will control my destiny, not Heaven!

Perhaps he is naïve, or perhaps, is the start of a new epic journey!>
